# Evaluation of the initial risk estimation layer at follow-up index dates

Follow-up index dates are defined at 1/2/3/4/5 years after baseline. Calibration and discrimination are assessed at 5 and 10 years.

## Calibration

### Female

```{r, echo = FALSE, out.width = "50%", fig.show = "hold", fig.align = "default"}
knitr::include_graphics(paste("../../../figures/p4/temporalv_initial_prototype3_calib_ph_d1v1_", 2, "_nk", 4, "_tfup", round(1*365.25), "_teval", c(5,10), ".png", sep = ""))
knitr::include_graphics(paste("../../../figures/p4/temporalv_initial_prototype3_calib_ph_d1v1_", 2, "_nk", 4, "_tfup", round(2*365.25), "_teval", c(5,10), ".png", sep = ""))
knitr::include_graphics(paste("../../../figures/p4/temporalv_initial_prototype3_calib_ph_d1v1_", 2, "_nk", 4, "_tfup", round(3*365.25), "_teval", c(5,10), ".png", sep = ""))

```
